evt_spawn_monsters_desc: The game looks so peacefull, so i spawned some monsters.
evt_game_speed_desc: Do I REALLY need to explan this...
evt_kill_all_monsters_desc: Honestly, they are too strong. How dare they do that.
evt_quake_fov_desc: Do you know game called Quake?
evt_break_all_door_desc: Breaks all hingies, even drawer doors.
evt_hallucination_desc: Did you fall for it? No? Next time I will make sound play with level's monsters.
evt_show_all_drawers_in_map_desc: Drawers are doors too, but why they're not showing in the map?
evt_increase_valuable_desc: Increases or Decreases all valuable's price.
evt_no_jump_sprint_desc: It costs many energy to move that metal body.
evt_disable_all_lights_desc: Disable all level lights, making it very bright.
evt_gravity_mult_desc: It's fun to mess with gravity.
evt_oil_floor_desc: Be careful! The floor is a bit slippery.
exception_endofstream_config_1: You got EndOfStreamException, maybe the settings file has been corruptted, or empty.
exception_endofstream_config_2: Do not worry. You can repair that for just opening settings menu and changing something.
exception_config_version_match: Config Load Error: This config is saved on higher version!
